document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">She's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">happy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">new </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Content </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">feels </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">like </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Sacrament </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">She's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">busy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">altered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Care </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">apprenticed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">Air </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">She's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">tearful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">she </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">weep </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">blissful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Causes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Most </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cdcff">permit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">meek </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">such </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Fate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9c88ff">minister </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: She's happy with a new content
